article_title: The Man Who Discovered the Gruber Videos Rich Weinstein: The Law Says What is Says
article_text:
Obamacare on Trial! On Wednesday the Supreme Court will begin to hear arguments in King v. Burwell, the latest legal challenge to the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act, or ACA. The case boils down to an argument over how to interpret seven words in the legislation, also known as “Obamacare,” that define who may receive a government subsidy to help pay for health insurance.

Rich Weinstein, the guy who discovered the Jonathan Gruber tapes joined the show this afternoon. Weinstein told Gibson that Obamacare Arguments to SCOTUS focus on what the law actually says not what supporters wish it says.

Like us on Facebook & Follow us on Twitter
